title: Existence of solutions to a quasilinear nonlocal PDE
authors: Lisbeth Carrero and Alexander Quaas and Andres Zuniga
abstract:
In this paper, we introduce a new class of quasilinear operators, which
represents a nonlocal version of the operator studied by Stuart and Zhou [1],
inspired by models in nonlinear optics. We will study the existence of at least
one or two solutions in the cone $X=\{u\in H^s_0(\Omega): u\geq 0\}$ using
variational methods. For this purpose, we analyze two scenarios: the asymptotic
sublinear and linear growth cases for the reaction term. Additionally, in the
sublinear case, we establish a nonexistence result.
